about_the_game:
ABOUT THE GAME


Immerse yourself in a gorgeous hand-drawn journey with unique protagonists on an existential quest to find one’s self, as the mysterious protagonists, known as
  • Nico - confident yet emotional
  • Yuna - Tough yet gullible
  • Mika - Intelligent yet shy
  • Linn - dependable yet insecure
look to expose the Gotoku atmosphere for what it could truly be.
Your odd and existential quest will take you from the grittier streets and factories of Mainland Gotoku to an isle of fraught and frigid snow lands, known only as the Northern region of Gotoku.

THE ATMOSPHERE OF MILOSC


Half visual novel, half JRPG, this experience will be nothing but unique & intense.

EXPERIENCE JRPG BATTLE


At the protagonist’s disposal will be their mythical and pragmatic ORBS. Our protagonists will be able to not only level up with the powers of their ORBS, but they will be able to utilize them in many different and interesting ways. Battle dozens of passionate enemies in a black & white hand-drawn world with an easy-to-learn, hard-to-master combat system.

INTERACTIVE WORLD


Take on some unprecedented and subjective quests from odd NPCs, discover intriguing secrets immersed in this JRPG universe, and enjoy the unusual dialogue embedded in this post-apocalyptic world that Nico, Yuna, Mika, and Linn are just waiting to uncover.

Your odd and existential quest will take you from the grittier streets and factories of Mainland Gotoku to an isle of fraught and frigid snow lands, known only as the Northern region of Gotoku.

name: milosc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 0nboard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: miłość is a minimalist black & white framed game about friendship, love, self-exploration and existentialism. miłość is a unique blend of visual novels, JRPG’s and platforming beauty.
